arts.ttl: Dinamo Zagreb pick up first win against struggling Salzburg
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Dinamo Zagreb picked up their first Champions League win of the season against a struggling 10-man RB Salzburg who have lost three games out of three.

arts.ttl: Pep Lijnders five-word verdict on new Liverpool boss Arne Slot speaks volumes
arts.sum: Pep Lijnders was Jurgen Klopp's right-hand man at Liverpool, and the Dutchman has been enthused by what he's seen during the early months of Arne Slot's reign at Anfield

arts.ttl: RB Salzburg vs. Dinamo Zagreb (23 de Oct., 2024) Resultados en Vivo

arts.ttl: RB Salzburg vs Dinamo Zagreb predictions: Visitors underrated against struggling hosts
arts.sum: Two struggling teams meet in the Champions League when RB Salzburg host Dinamo Zagreb and Dan Fitch has seen signs of life from the visitors.
